General.Name: Carmat SA
General.Description: Carmat SA designs and develops total artificial heart for people suffering from end-stage biventricular heart failure in France and internationally. Its product includes Aeson, an active implantable medical device intended to replace the ventricles of the native heart in patients suffering from advanced heart failure. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Vélizy-Villacoublay, France.
